freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign regionName>${row["Region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign regionId>${regionName?lower_case}</#assign> <#assign m49Code>${row["Region Code"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row m49_region "${regionId}" custom-table-row m49_region "${regionId}" set field display_name "${regionName}" set field m49_code "${m49Code}" exit </#list>
